description: A Content Management System (CMS) written with Ruby on Rails

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM user key for S3 and optionally SES

AWS_REGION.description: The Amazon Web Services region used for S3 and optionally SES

AWS_S3_BUCKET.description: The Amazon Web Services S3 bucket name

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM user secret for S3 and optionally SES

DISABLE_SPRING.description: Ensures Spring is not running on server

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google client ID for OAuth login

GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google client secret for OAuth login

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Set to same as the Heroku App name (set automatically for review apps)

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A randomly generated secret to verify sessions

SEED_SITE_HOST.description: The host for the first site (defaults to HEROKU_APP_NAME.herokuapp.com)

SEED_USER_EMAIL.description: The email address for the first system administrator user

name: obduk C.M.S.
